description:
**Fix Overview**:

To mitigate the elevation of privilege vulnerability in the Windows Resilient File System (Refs) as described in CVE-2024-43514:

1. Download and apply the relevant KB updates for your Windows version from the official Microsoft Update Catalog links below.
   - For Windows 11 Version 24H2: [KB5044284](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5044284)
   - For Windows 11 Version 23H2: [KB5044285](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5044285)
   - For Windows 11 Version 22H2: [KB5044285](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5044285)
   - For Windows 11 Version 21H2: [KB5044280](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5044280)
   - For Windows 10 (both x64 and 32-bit systems): [KB5044286](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5044286)
   - For Windows 10 Version 22H2: [KB5044273](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5044273)

2. Restart your system after applying the updates to ensure the changes take effect.

**Details**:
This update resolves a critical issue by addressing the likelihood of elevation of privilege attacks. Ensure that you have sufficient permissions to apply these updates. Backup important data before proceeding with installations to prevent data loss in the update process.
